overview: Looking for a boyfriend? We've got plenty of them! In the follow up to the hit series Boyfriends, NakedSword Originals brings you eight hot guys in four real-life relationships. From casual lovers to committed partners, from the fiery to the free-spirited, NakedSword shows you how these true lovers make it happen. Whether it's that sweet glance or unrestrained pounding, these four intensely sexual couples show you what real sex looks like. You may not be ready for a husband, but you'll definitely want a boyfriend.
title: Boyfriends 2
